app-role.name: Administrator
app-role.description: Administrators can view and modify all application attributes, and start and stop servers.

app-role.name: AppConnectionManager
app-role.description: Users with this role can manage portlet producers and external applications.

app-role.name: AppConnectionViewer
app-role.description: Users with this role can view portlet producers and external applications.

attribute.name: CURRENT_GMT_TIME
attribute.description: The attribute will be assigned current time value n GMT time zone during evaluation

attribute.name: CURRENT_GMT_DATE
attribute.description: The attribute will be assigned current date value n GMT time zone during evaluation

attribute.name: CURRENT_GMT_DATETIME
attribute.description: The attribute will be assigned current date and time value in GMT time zone during evaluation

attribute.name: SYS_SUBJECTGROUPS
attribute.description: List of unqualified group names to which user belongs: ["admin", "managers"]

attribute.name: SYS_SUBJECTROLES
attribute.description: List of unqualified role names granted to user for current request

attribute.name: SYS_APP
attribute.description: Unqualified name of the binding resource for the resource on which the query is performed: admin

attribute.name: SYS_OBJ_TYPE
attribute.description: ResourceType on which the query is performed: LibraryResourceType

attribute.name: SYS_OBJ
attribute.description: Resource on which the query is performed: bar

attribute.name: SYS_OBJ_Q
attribute.description: Full qualified resource name on which the query is performed: /foo/bar

attribute.name: SYS_PRIVILEGE
attribute.description: Unqualified name of the action on which the resource is being queried.

attribute.name: ACCESS_SUBJECT
attribute.description: This attribute indicates the system entity that initiated the access request.

attribute.name: RESOURCE_ID
attribute.description: This attribute identifies the resource to which access is requested.

attribute.name: RESOURCE_TYPE_ID
attribute.description: This attribute identifies the resource type of the resource to which access is requested.

attribute.name: CURRENT_TIME
attribute.description: This attribute indicates the current time at the PDP. In practice, it is the time at which authorization decision for the request is calculated.

attribute.name: CURRENT_DATE
attribute.description: This attribute indicates the current date at the PDP. In practice, it is the date when authorization decision for the request is calculated.

function.name: DNS_NAME_IS_IN
function.description: Deprecated. Use DNS_NAME_IS_IN_BAG function instead. It takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssDNSName, the second one is a bag of type OpssDNSName. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: ANY_URI_AT_LEAST_ONE_MEMBER_OF
function.description: This function takes two arguments that are both bag of OpssAnyURI and returns true if and only if at least one element of the first argument is contained in the second argument

function.name: YEAR_MONTH_DURATION_BAG_SIZE
function.description: This function takes a bag of OpssYearMonthDuration values and returns the size of the input bag.

function.name: BASE64_BINARY_AT_LEAST_ONE_MEMBER_OF
function.description: This function takes two arguments that are both bag of OpssBase64Binary and returns true if and only if at least one element of the first argument is contained in the second argument

function.name: RFC822_NAME_EQUAL
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssRFC822Name and returns an OpssBoolean. The function returns true if and only if the arguments are equal. Otherwise, it returns false.

function.name: TIME_BAG
function.description: This function takes any number of arguments of type OpssTime and returns a bag of all arguments passed to it.

function.name: INTEGER_SET_EQUALS
function.description: This function return true if any only if first argument is a subset of second argument AND second argument is a subset of first argument.

function.name: HEX_BINARY_IS_IN_BAG
function.description: This function takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssHexBinary, the second one is a bag of type OpssHexBinary. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: DATE_TIME_SUBTRACT_DAYTIME_DURATION
function.description: This function will subtract second argument from the first one and return the result as OpssDateTime

function.name: DOUBLE_MULTIPLY
function.description: This functions takes two or more arguments of type OpssDouble and returns their product.

function.name: NOT
function.description: This function returns true if its arguments evaluates to false, otherwise, it returns false

function.name: TIME_IS_IN
function.description: Deprecated. Use TIME_IS_IN_BAG function instead. It takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssTime, the second one is a bag of type OpssTime. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: ANY_URI_SET_EQUALS
function.description: This function return true if any only if first argument is a subset of second argument AND second argument is a subset of first argument.

function.name: DATE_TIME_ADD_YEARMONTH_DURATION
function.description: This function will add its two arguments and return the result as OpssDateTime

function.name: STRING_FROM_ANY_URI
function.description: This function will convert its argument to a string value.

function.name: DOUBLE_ONE_AND_ONLY
function.description: This function takes a bag of OpssDouble values and returns the value in the bag if bag contains only one value. Otherwise its result is Indeterminate

function.name: STRING_BAG_SIZE
function.description: This function takes a bag of OpssString values and returns the size of the input bag.

function.name: TIME_SET_EQUALS
function.description: This function return true if any only if first argument is a subset of second argument AND second argument is a subset of first argument.

function.name: DAY_TIME_DURATION_SUBSET
function.description: This function takes two bags of type OpssDayTimeDuration and returns true if and only if the first argument is a subset of the second argument

function.name: DOUBLE_IS_IN_BAG
function.description: This function takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssDouble, the second one is a bag of type OpssDouble. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: STRING_IS_IN_BAG
function.description: This function takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssString, the second one is a bag of type OpssString. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: STRING_IS_IN
function.description: Deprecated. Use STRING_IS_IN_BAG function instead. It takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssString, the second one is a bag of type OpssString. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: DNS_NAME_REGEXP_MATCH
function.description: This function takes two arguments. The first is of type OpssString and represents a regular expression. The second argument is of type OpssDNSName. This function returns true if the string value of the second argument matches the regular expression.

function.name: VALID_UNTIL_TIME
function.description: This function keeps the decision cache valid until the time specified by first argument.

function.name: HEX_BINARY_ONE_AND_ONLY
function.description: This function takes a bag of OpssHexBinary values and returns the value in the bag if bag contains only one value. Otherwise its result is Indeterminate

function.name: BOOLEAN_FROM_STRING
function.description: This function will convert the value of OpssString argument to OpssBoolean

function.name: GET_INTEGER_IDENTITY_CONTEXT
function.description: This function will return a Integer value of ID Context attribute of type Integer

function.name: DATE_TIME_INTERSECTION
function.description: This function takes two arguments, each a bag of OpssDateTime and returns a bag containing elements that are common between the two bags.

function.name: STRING_FROM_X500_NAME
function.description: This function will convert its argument to a string value.

function.name: IP_ADDRESS_BAG
function.description: This function takes any number of arguments of type OpssIPAddress and returns a bag of all arguments passed to it.

function.name: BOOLEAN_SET_EQUALS
function.description: This function return true if any only if first argument is a subset of second argument AND second argument is a subset of first argument.

function.name: YEAR_MONTH_DURATION_SUBSET
function.description: This function takes two bags of type OpssYearMonthDuration and returns true if and only if the first argument is a subset of the second argument

function.name: BASE64_BINARY_IS_IN
function.description: Deprecated. Use BASE64_BINARY_IS_IN_BAG function instead. It takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssBase64Binary, the second one is a bag of type OpssBase64Binary. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: RFC822_NAME_MATCH
function.description: This function takes two arguments, first is of type string and second is of type rfc822Name. It returns true if and only if the first argument's local part - if any - matches the second argument by case-sensitive matching and/ or its domain part - if any - matches domain part of second argument by case-insensitive domain matching.

function.name: YEAR_MONTH_DURATION_INTERSECTION
function.description: This function takes two arguments, each a bag of OpssYearMonthDuration and returns a bag containing elements that are common between the two bags.

function.name: ANY_URI_EQUAL
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssAnyURI and returns an OpssBoolean. The function returns true if and only if the arguments are equal. Otherwise, it returns false.

function.name: STRING_UNION
function.description: This function takes two bags of type OpssString and returns a bag containing all elements from each of them.

function.name: ANY_URI_ENDS_WITH
function.description: This function returns true if string format of second argument ends with the first argument.

function.name: DATE_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssDate and returns an OpssBoolean. It returns True if the value of the first parameter is greater than or equal to the second.

function.name: DATE_ADD_YEARMONTH_DURATION
function.description: This function will add its two arguments and return the result as OpssDate

function.name: DOUBLE_SUBSET
function.description: This function takes two bags of type OpssDouble and returns true if and only if the first argument is a subset of the second argument

function.name: HEX_BINARY_IS_IN
function.description: Deprecated. Use HEX_BINARY_IS_IN_BAG function instead. It takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssHexBinary, the second one is a bag of type OpssHexBinary. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: DOUBLE_EQUAL
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssDouble and returns an OpssBoolean. The function returns true if and only if the arguments are equal. Otherwise, it returns false.

function.name: X500_NAME_REGEXP_MATCH
function.description: This function takes two arguments. The first is of type OpssString and represents a regular expression. The second argument is of type OpssX500Name. This function returns true if the string value of the second argument matches the regular expression.

function.name: RFC822_NAME_SET_EQUALS
function.description: This function return true if any only if first argument is a subset of second argument AND second argument is a subset of first argument.

function.name: STRING_REGEXP_MATCH
function.description: Deprecated. Use STRING_REGEXP_MATCH_XACML instead. It takes two arguments. The first is of type OpssString. The second argument is of type OpssString and represents a regular expression. This function returns true if the string value of the first argument matches the regular expression.

function.name: STRING_INTERSECTION
function.description: This function takes two arguments, each a bag of OpssString and returns a bag containing elements that are common between the two bags.

function.name: X500_NAME_INTERSECTION
function.description: This function takes two arguments, each a bag of OpssX500Name and returns a bag containing elements that are common between the two bags.

function.name: DOUBLE_INTERSECTION
function.description: This function takes two arguments, each a bag of OpssDouble and returns a bag containing elements that are common between the two bags.

function.name: VALID_FOR_MSECONDS
function.description: This function keeps the decision cache valid for the number of milliseconds specified by first argument.

function.name: ANY_URI_STARTS_WITH
function.description: This function returns true if string format of second argument ends with the first argument.

function.name: DAY_TIME_DURATION_IS_IN
function.description: Deprecated. Use DAY_TIME_DURATION_IS_IN_BAG function instead. It takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssDayTimeDuration, the second one is a bag of type OpssDayTimeDuration. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: BOOLEAN_EQUAL
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssBoolean and returns an OpssBoolean. The function returns true if and only if the arguments are equal. Otherwise, it returns false.

function.name: BOOLEAN_ONE_AND_ONLY
function.description: This function takes a bag of OpssBoolean values and returns the value in the bag if bag contains only one value. Otherwise its result is Indeterminate

function.name: STRING_ONE_AND_ONLY
function.description: This function takes a bag of OpssString values and returns the value in the bag if bag contains only one value. Otherwise its result is Indeterminate

function.name: INTEGER_MOD
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssInteger and returns the remainder after dividing first argument with the second.

function.name: BASE64_BINARY_IS_IN_BAG
function.description: This function takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssBase64Binary, the second one is a bag of type OpssBase64Binary. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: BOOLEAN_IS_IN
function.description: Deprecated. Use BOOLEAN_IS_IN_BAG function instead. It takes two arguments. The first one is of type OpssBoolean, the second one is a bag of type OpssBoolean. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

function.name: DAY_TIME_DURATION_EQUAL
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssDayTimeDuration and returns an OpssBoolean. The function returns true if and only if the arguments are equal. Otherwise, it returns false.

function.name: DOUBLE_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssDouble and returns an OpssBoolean. It returns True if the value of the first parameter is greater than or equal to the second.

function.name: DATE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssDate and returns an OpssBoolean. It returns True if the value of the first parameter is less than or equal to the second.

function.name: RFC822_NAME_BAG
function.description: This function takes any number of arguments of type OpssRFC822Name and returns a bag of all arguments passed to it.

function.name: TIME_GREATER_THAN
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssTime and returns an OpssBoolean. It returns true if the value of the first parameter is greater than that of second.

function.name: DOUBLE_BAG
function.description: This function takes any number of arguments of type OpssDouble and returns a bag of all arguments passed to it.

function.name: HEX_BINARY_SET_EQUALS
function.description: This function return true if any only if first argument is a subset of second argument AND second argument is a subset of first argument.

function.name: DOUBLE_DIVIDE
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssDouble, divides the first argument by second and returns the of division.

function.name: DNS_NAME_BAG_SIZE
function.description: This function takes a bag of OpssDNSName values and returns the size of the input bag.

function.name: INTEGER_TO_DOUBLE
function.description: This function converts an OpssInteger to OpssDouble.

function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssString and returns an OpssBoolean. The function returns true if and only if the arguments are equal. Otherwise, it returns false.

function.name: DATE_TIME_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: This function takes two arguments of type OpssDateTime and returns an OpssBoolean. It returns True if the value of the first parameter is greater than or equal to the second.

function.description: This function takes a bag of OpssDateTime values and returns the size of the input bag.

function.name: BASE64_BINARY_BAG
function.description: This function takes any number of arguments of type OpssBase64Binary and returns a bag of all arguments passed to it.

function.name: TIME_FROM_STRING

function.name: IP_ADDRESS_REGEXP_MATCH

function.name: IP_ADDRESS_IS_IN_BAG

function.description: This function takes two bags of type OpssAnyURI and returns a bag containing all elements from each of them.

function.description: This function takes two bags of type OpssDate and returns a bag containing all elements from each of them.

function.description: This function returns a substring of string representation of first argument starting from position indicated by second argument and end at position indicated by third argument.

function.name: N_OF
function.description: The first argument to this function must be an OpssInteger. Remaining arguments must be of type OpssBoolean. The first argument specifies the minimum number of the remaining arguments that MUST evaluate to true for the function to evaluate to true. If the first argument is 0, the result is true. If the number of arguments after the first one is less than the value of the first argument, then the function result will be Indeterminate.

The first one is of type OpssYearMonthDuration, the second one is a bag of type OpssYearMonthDuration. This function returns true if the value of first argument in present in the bag represented by the second argument.

app-role.name: ApplicationPolicyAdmin
app-role.description: This role has Manage rights for a specific Application and any nested Policy Domain objects.
